patterns: What r the near by places to visit From NITK?
From nitk where can i visit?
responses:
1.Bekal Fort, Kasargod
2.St. Mary's Island, Udupi
3.Goa
4.Karwar
5.Kudremukh
6.Madikeri, Kodagu
7.Kemmangundi
8.Udhagamandalam (Ooty)
9.Udupi
10.Kateel
11.Sringeri
12.kollur
13.Dharmasthala
14.Sabarimala
15.Guruvayoor

17.Potah
It is a coastal fortress and verdant beach situated 70 km off Mangalore. Bekal Fort can be reached from Kasargod, Kerala State; which in turn is an hour's bus ride from Mangalore
Tiles Factory; situated off the coast, is a volcanic island.
Known worldwide for beaches, and architecture. 360 km's, 8 hrs by daily buses and trains
Beaches, SeaBird Naval base and Kaiga Nuclear power plant. 5 hrs by regular daytime buses and trains.
Forest Reserve and Trekker's Paradise. 3 hrs by bus from NITK.
a visit to the Coorg coffee plantations and waterfalls to recharge spent batteries. 3 hrs from Mangalore by bus.
Cool air,waterfalls and lush greenery. Only for the steel-willed and clad explorers
Queen Of Hill Stations, famed for its annual flower show. 12 hour bus journey via Mysore
NITK is close to the temple towns of Udupi (Sri Krishna Temple and Madhva Maths) 50 km
Kateel (Durgaparameshwari Temple) 20km
Sringeri (Sharada Peetham) 75km
Kollur (Mookambika Temple) 75km
Dharmasthala - 100km
Place of pilgrimage for Lord Ayyappa devotees. Season commences mid-November every year. KSRTC organizes overnight bus services each season.
Famed Sri Krishna Temple in Kerala, regular overnight bus services.
world-famous Dassurah festival and Chamundi hills; regular overnight bus services. Retreat Centre.
spiritual centre in South Kerala, on the rail route from Mangalore to Thiruvananthapuram

The Institute has three guest houses within the campus. The guest houses are located on the western side of the National Highway 
(NH66), near the beach (Arabian Sea). They are named as JCBose, Vikram Sarabhai and Homi J Bhaba. J C Bose Guest house 
furnished with A/C Suites with a telephone, TV and Internet connections in each room. VIPs, Institute guests and invited guests are 
accommodated here. The Vikram Sarabhai and Homi J Baba Guest House have A/C, telephone and TV connections in each rooms.

Residential campus is made up of Quarters for faculties and staff equipped with all modern amenities. Director's Bungalow, 
Professors & Asst. professors quarters, Lectures & Asst. lectures quarters, Warden quarters, Bachelors quarters and Non-teaching 
staff colony has been separately developed.

A full-fledged Physical Education & Sports Department with one Studentsâ€™ Activity and Sports Officer (SAS Officer) and one Assistant
Physical Director provides and manages sports, games and physical fitness facilities.

International Standard, 50 Mts. x 25 Mts. Size, with 90 Cm. depth at shallow end and 5 Mts. depth at deeper end. 3 Platforms of 1 
Mt., 3 Mts. and 5 Mts height for Diving, and One Spring Board fitted at 1 Mt. height for Diving. Anti wave Lane markers to conduct 
competitions is also provided. Take off Boards are portable. Fiber of Olympic type is fitted. It has the capability to accommodate 150 
to 200 people at a time.

Two shopping centers are exists in the campus where bakery, vegetable shop, cloth shop, tailoring, saloon, beauty parlor, laundry, 
printing press, provisional store etc are available.
Two banks (Canara bank and State bank of India) with ATM facility are available in the campus.

Open Air Theatre (Students Activity Centre)
One open Air theatre of about 1000 seating capacity is available.
One Auditorium of about 1,200 seating capacity is available (is being fully air-conditioned)
One Kannada Medium (State Board) and one English medium (CBSE board) schools are function in the campus.
Two canteens and three-four small cafeterias are available
One post office is available in the Institute campus.

How many departments are there in NITK?
responses: 11 Departments.

patterns: what all departments are there in NITK?
what all branches are there in Btech course?
responses:
There are 9 branches available for Btech course.\
1.Computer Science.\
2.Information Technology.\
3.Electronics and Communication Engineering.
4.Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
5.Mechanical Engineering.
6.Civil Engineering.
7.Chemical Engineering.
8.Mining Engineering.
9.Metallurgy Engineering.

patterns: How can someone get admitted to NITK for Btech?
responses: To get into NITK, one has to clear the JEE Mains exam with a valid AIR rank.

patterns: Which grading pattern does NITK follow?
responses: NITK follows the CGPA grading pattern.

patterns: What is the placement percentage of NITK?
responses: Around 90% Graduates get placed in NITK.
